choices.text: A programming language for web development
A distributed version control system for tracking code changes
A cloud storage service for files

question: What does "distributed" mean in a distributed version control system?

choices.text: The code is stored only on a central server
Every developer has a full copy of the repository history
Files are automatically shared to the cloud
Only the project lead has access to the history

question: Which of the following is NOT a benefit of using Git?
Git was created by Linus Torvalds, the creator of Linux.
In the context of version control, what is a "commit"?

choices.text: A promise to write better code
A snapshot of your project at a specific point in time
A message sent to your team
A backup stored in the cloud
